radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple white matter lesions predominantly involving the right frontal and left basal ganglia region.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI brain performed 1 year after presentation showed significant regression of the previously described white matter lesions.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse and symmetric hyperintensity in the cerebral white matter extending into the subcortical U-fibers and symmetric lesions in the middle cerebellar peduncle.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The neurologic status was unchanged during follow-up for 1 year.
